custom_147268 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn
div.p: Good afternoon from Vega ISD, it was so good to see some of our students this morning and we miss each and everyone one of you. I know we all got choked up at times throughout the whole trip.Â

Governor Abbott had a news conference this afternoon and has ordered schools to continue distance learning until May 4th. I know this is an inconvenience to everyone (students, teachers and parents) and we all want to get back to school. Hang in there and Iâ€™m talking to everybody. If youâ€™re having issues, communicate with your teachers and principals. We have been at it for four/five days and we will continue to monitor our progress and make adjustments as needed.Â
Vega ISD will persevere throughout this crisis!!Â
Itâ€™s a great day to be a Longhorn!!!

div.p:
Mission: Through vision and commitment, Vega ISD creates a challenging learning environment that encourages high expectations for life long success.Â We strive to have our parents, teachers, and community members actively involved in and supportive of our students' learning.Â
Â
Vision: Academic Excellence for All Students--School-Wide Accountability---Always Raising the Bar
